name: authelia-oidc-examples
description: POC for implementing OIDC with Authelia

scripts.keygen: docker run --rm -u "$(id -u):$(id -g)" -v "$(pwd)":/keys authelia/authelia:latest authelia crypto pair rsa generate --bits 4096 --directory /keys
scripts.genjwt: if [[ ! -f ./.local/secrets/JWT_SECRET ]]; then npm run --silent secret-generator -- > ./.local/secrets/JWT_SECRET; fi;
scripts.gensession: if [[ ! -f ./.local/secrets/SESSION_SECRET ]]; then npm run --silent secret-generator -- > ./.local/secrets/SESSION_SECRET; fi;
scripts.genstorage: if [[ ! -f ./.local/secrets/STORAGE_ENCRYPTION_KEY ]]; then npm run --silent secret-generator -- > ./.local/secrets/STORAGE_ENCRYPTION_KEY; fi;
scripts.genoutlinekey: if [[ ! -f ./.local/secrets/OUTLINE_SECRET_KEY ]]; then npm run --silent secret-generator -- > ./.local/secrets/OUTLINE_SECRET_KEY; fi;
scripts.genoutlineutils: if [[ ! -f ./.local/secrets/OUTLINE_UTILS_SECRET ]]; then npm run --silent secret-generator -- > ./.local/secrets/OUTLINE_UTILS_SECRET; fi;
scripts.gen-secrets: npm run genjwt && npm run gensession && npm run genstorage && npm run genoutlinekey && npm run genoutlineutils
scripts.postinstall: npm run keygen && npm run certgen && npm run gen-secrets
scripts.stop: docker compose down && docker compose down

author: Benny Michaels <npm@bnry.be> (https://bnry.be)
